title: Peissnitzhaus
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Beer/Wine, Take-out, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. On a green island near the city centre and driven by an NGO, this place hosts numerous cultural events every year (puppet theater, concerts, family events). Over half of the meals are vegetarian or vegan. Has vegan cake, plant milk. In the summer it's like a biergarten but with families and children.
